title: Front Page

sub_fields.label: Select Featured Partners
sub_fields.name: partners_featured
sub_fields.instructions: Select specific partners to display. Leave empty to automatically show all partners.

sub_fields.label: Items Per Page
sub_fields.name: partners_items_per_page
sub_fields.instructions: Number of partners to display (only applies if no featured partners are selected)

sub_fields.label: Policy Span Text
sub_fields.name: policy_span_text
sub_fields.instructions: Small text above the policy title

sub_fields.label: Policy Description
sub_fields.name: policy_description
sub_fields.instructions: Description text for the policy section
sub_fields.default_value: ChainThat's enterprise-grade, highly configurable insurance technology platforms – Beyond Policy Administration (BPA) and Beyond Multi-National Programs (BMNP) – activate agility and innovation in processes and operations, empowering your business to thrive in competitive spaces.

fields.label: Year Background Images
fields.name: year_background_images
fields.instructions: Add background images for the year section carousel

fields.label: Year Statistics
fields.name: year_statistics
fields.instructions: Add statistics for the year section

sub_fields.label: Statistic Number
sub_fields.name: year_stat_number
sub_fields.instructions: The number or value for the statistic

sub_fields.label: Service Cards
sub_fields.name: service_cards
sub_fields.instructions: Add service cards for the 4-grid layout

sub_fields.label: Service Button Text
sub_fields.name: service_button_text
sub_fields.instructions: Text for the service section button

sub_fields.label: Service Button Link
sub_fields.name: service_button_link
sub_fields.instructions: Link for the service section button

fields.label: Mobile Swoos Image
fields.name: mobile_swoos_image
fields.instructions: Mobile version of the swoos image

fields.label: Swoos Section
fields.name: swoos_section
fields.instructions: Swoos2 images between partners and policy sections

sub_fields.label: Swoos2 Desktop Image
sub_fields.name: swoos2_desktop_image
sub_fields.instructions: Desktop version of the swoos2 image

sub_fields.label: Swoos2 Mobile Image
sub_fields.name: swoos2_mobile_image
sub_fields.instructions: Mobile version of the swoos2 image

fields.label: Swoos3 Desktop Image
fields.name: swoos3_desktop_image
fields.instructions: Desktop version of the swoos3 image (after service section)

fields.label: Swoos3 Mobile Image
fields.name: swoos3_mobile_image
fields.instructions: Mobile version of the swoos3 image (after service section)

sub_fields.label: Working Title
sub_fields.name: working_title
sub_fields.instructions: Title for the working with ChainThat section

sub_fields.label: Working Description
sub_fields.name: working_description
sub_fields.instructions: Description for the working with ChainThat section
sub_fields.default_value: ChainThat's a cloud-native platform that improves market speed, customer satisfaction, and efficiency. Many insurers globally are benefiting, operationally and strategically, from such a platform. Let's hear it from our clients & partners.

sub_fields.label: Select Case Studies
sub_fields.name: working_items
sub_fields.instructions: Select case studies to display (will alternate image/content layout)

sub_fields.label: Select Reviews
sub_fields.name: select_reviews
sub_fields.instructions: Select which reviews to display (leave empty to show all reviews)

sub_fields.label: Review Button Text
sub_fields.name: review_button_text
sub_fields.instructions: Text for the review section button

sub_fields.label: Review Button Link
sub_fields.name: review_button_link
sub_fields.instructions: Link for the review section button

sub_fields.label: Blog Bottom Title
sub_fields.name: blog_bottom_title
sub_fields.instructions: Title for the bottom section of blog area

sub_fields.label: Select Featured Posts
sub_fields.name: blog_featured_posts
sub_fields.instructions: Select specific news posts to display. Leave empty to automatically show the latest posts.

sub_fields.label: Items Per Page
sub_fields.name: blog_items_per_page
sub_fields.instructions: Number of news items to display (only applies if no featured posts are selected)

sub_fields.label: Enable Carousel
sub_fields.name: blog_enable_carousel
sub_fields.instructions: Enable carousel for more than 3 items on desktop

fields.label: Section Controls
fields.name: front_page_section_controls
fields.instructions: Control which sections to show or hide on the Front page

description: Complete ACF fields for the Front Page template
